title: Pipe Spring National Monument: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       All federal vacancy announcements for Pipe Spring National Monument are posted at USAJobs, the official job site of the United States Government. Career fields at Pipe Spring include administration, education, archeology, biological science, and maintenance.  Â      Seasonal Employment  Pipe Spring hires seasonal employees throughout the year. Seasonal jobs include park rangers, biological science technicians, archaeological science technicians, park guides, maintenance employees, and others. All seasonal positions at Pipe Spring are posted at USAJobs. Most seasonal appointments are for 1,040 hours (six months).    Permanent Employment  To qualify for permanent positions, applicants must meet one of the following criteria:    Must currently be a permanent federal employee OR  Must have been a permanent/status federal employee OR  Must have completed at least two years equivalent as a seasonal employee OR  May apply through an "All Sources/All Qualified" announcement OR  May be veterans who are honorably discharged after at least three years of continuous active military service. Check on specific announcement to see if eligible to apply OR  Must be eligible for special appointing authorities such as VISTA volunteer, Peace Corps staff or volunteer, disabled veteran, etc.
